sqlMap.select: SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, URL, DEPTH, (SELECT MENU_ID FROM T_MENU B WHERE B.PARENT_ID=A.MENU_ID AND B.SORT_NO='1' AND ROWNUM = '1') SMENU_ID, CASE WHEN (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM T_MENU_AUTH WHERE ADMIN_ID = #USER_ID# AND MENU_ID=A.MENU_ID AND RECODE_ST='A') > 0 THEN 'Y' ELSE 'N' END MENU_AUTH FROM T_MENU A WHERE RECODE_ST = 'A' AND DEPTH='1' AND MENU_TYP='AM' AND ADM_TYP = 'GKL' ORDER BY SORT_NO

SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, URL, DEPTH FROM T_MENU WHERE RECODE_ST = 'A' AND DEPTH='2' AND MENU_TYP='AM' AND ADM_TYP = 'GKL'
AND PARENT_ID = 'ME_MAIN'
AND PARENT_ID = #TMENUID#
ORDER BY SORT_NO

SELECT MENU_ID, MENU_NM, URL, DEPTH, PARENT_ID FROM T_MENU WHERE RECODE_ST = 'A' AND DEPTH='3' AND MENU_TYP='AM' AND ADM_TYP = 'GKL'
ORDER BY SORT_NO
